Summary Heading: All you need in your home away from home!
Summary: We (wife and baby daughter) loved our Kasa stay here!  The rooms were very spacious, modern, and open.  We loved the bed, it was very large and the sheets were cozy.  Bathtubs, also very huge!  Our daughter had a blast during bath time in her personal indoor pool - that how big it felt.    The property was right across the street to a shopping center that we did get to check out.  Lots of great shops and places to eat.  We did also check out Downtown Disney, one our favorite places to be.  It's just a quick 10-minute drive that you don't have to take the freeway if you don't want to.  Really awesome for when you have taken the little ones back home for a quick nap and adults for a recharge.    We also discovered a couple of public market food courts nearby; the Anaheim Packing
